Hello, World!

Welcome to my GitHub microsite. Hand-coded, with love.

Right now this site will feature part of my portfolio, specifically some of the articles that I submitted as coursework for the Erasmus Mundus Masters in Journalism, Media and Globalisation programme.

The vision for this website is to showcase my data-driven stories. I've already started--my output for my data journalism class is already online on this site.

Right now, I know this microsite offers a very limited experience, so go ahead and visit my main website, nathanielmelican.com and discover more of my work.

You can also head to my GitHub profile page to see the projects currently keeping me busy.

Thank you for visiting this part of the web!
